ygData.subject: Planes of Power
ygData.msgSnippet: I got Planes of Power yesterday...my boyfriend bought it for me. He is nuts...he bought me EverQuest, Ruins of Kunark, Shadows of Luclin and now Planes of
ygData.messageBody:
I got Planes of Power yesterday...my boyfriend bought it for me. He is
nuts...he bought me EverQuest, Ruins of Kunark, Shadows of Luclin and now
Planes of Power, all in a month or so...he is spoiling me! I keep telling
him no more, I will buy the expansions I need, but he doesn't listen...he
also bought me a three month EverQuest card. He is completely nuts, but I am
very thankful. I ordered him the Scars of Velious expansion off of
EBay...that is the only expansion he needs. Same here.

As for learning how to play EverQuest, I know how the newbies feel. I am
fairly new, and if it wasn't for my boyfriend to teach me everything, I
would be so lost. Just remember these few codes:

/ooc - Sends an out of character message
/shout -Sends a shout

If you have any questions what something means, just shout it or send an out
of character message and someone will help you out. I still have to shout
questions. You will catch on quickly. If you have any questions, feel free
to email me at: Thunder_Cat_4283@... and I will do what I can to
help you out. Also, here are a few short hands:

PST = Please Send Tell
WTS = Willing to Sell
WTB = Willing to Buy
LFG = Looking for Group

Good luck and have fun playing!
